Wits
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher DS Archive (DS): Monster Rancher DS: General QA: Wits
By Rahu on Thursday, August 12, 2010 - 09:49 am:

What does it do? I see items in game that raise and lower it, but what effect does it have being high or low?

Sorry this must seem like a total newb question, but the only thing I could think was making the monster more responsive to directions on the touch screen but... not that I could see.

Anyone know?

By Rahu on Thursday, August 12, 2010 - 01:46 pm:

Nobody knows?

By Thorr on Thursday, August 12, 2010 - 03:41 pm:

Higher Wits means higher success rate in training. The guide essentially says -

High Wits give:
Higher success in Training
Better results in Drills and Errantry
Better combining.

Low Wits give:
More Failures and Cheating in training

By Rahu on Thursday, August 12, 2010 - 05:19 pm:

That's interesting. One wonders why you would ever give the items designed to lower Wits. Anyway, thanks!

By Thorr on Thursday, August 12, 2010 - 06:44 pm:

You don't want the Wits stat to go to max. The monster then acts like a know-it-all and actually cheats more.
